switch.title: [MIUI10] Status bar notch
switch.desc: Open a start the middle notch of MI8 and 8SE bangscreen status bar in MUI10 to reduce the number of icons, tested available on MiX2 and Mi6. Reboot takes effect!

switch.title: [MIUI9] Notification Center Search Box
switch.desc: Closing this will hide the search box in the drop-down notification center by replacing the theme resource

switch.title: [MIUI10] Hide navbar
switch.desc: Hide the navigation bar by modifying its height through theme resources to facilitate the use of third-party gestures

switch.title: Real Blur
switch.desc: Dynamic blurring of the switch pull-down control center (valid for some models)

switch.title: [MIUI10] Screen rounded corners
switch.desc: Switch global rounded corner effect, tested on MiX2 and Mi6. Restart takes effect!

switch.title: [MIUI11] Disable USB pop-ups
switch.desc: When connecting the data cable, do not pop up the window to select the transfer mode

switch.title: One-handed mode
switch.desc: Whether to enable the one-handed mode function
switch.set: settings put system handy_mode_state 0 settings put system handy_mode_state $state

picker.title: Switching the display mode
picker.set: settings put system handy_mode_state 0 settings put system handy_mode_state 1 am broadcast -a miui.action.handymode.changemode --ei mode $state

param.title: Area size(%)
param.desc: The adjustable range in the system settings is 20%~100%
param.name: level

param.title: Vibration strength(%)
param.desc: More than 150% may have no significant effect
param.name: level

picker.title: Temp control config switch
picker.desc: Switching and restarting takes effect, currently only for Snapdragon Snapdragon 710, 730, 835, 845, 855 and Tiangui 820 series models

picker.title: Temp control config switch (2)
picker.desc: No need to reboot immediately after switching, currently only for 855, 865, 870, 888 models

action.title: Turn on the hidden temp control option in MIUI9 and MIUI10
action.desc: It depends on the character, maybe it is possible to open out, but not necessarily la! It is said that the stable version is not possible.

switch.title: [MIUI10] Online Update Check
switch.desc: Turn off this switch to block online update checking

switch.title: [MIUI10] Security Keyboard
switch.desc: Use MIUI's secure keyboard when entering passwords to avoid passwords being recorded as custom words by the input method. Reboot to take effect!

switch.title: [MIUI11] Camera Lab function
switch.desc: Turn on the lab function settings in the camera settings screen
switch.set: if [[ "$state" == "1" ]]; then mkdir -p /sdcard/DCIM/Camera/Lab_options_visible else rm -rf /sdcard/DCIM/Camera/Lab_options_visible fi am force-stop com.android.camera 2>/dev/null killall -9 com.android.camera 2>/dev/null

action.title: App Store Simplification
action.desc: Simplify app store layout and remove some ad recommendations
